description:
The simple lines and compact proportions make the Unit Table equally suitable in the dining room at home or working lunches in the office. The Unit Table was originally designed for an exhibition that also hosted evening dinners, with five units used to create one large communal table. With this in mind the legs were kept vertical and the overhang minimised allowing them to sit neatly side-by-side. Cut from a single sheet, the legs are attached with standard furniture bolts to allow easy assembly and dismantling. The Unit Table top is available in laminate or plywood. ## How to buy
#### [Managing it Yourself? Get quotes from a local maker »](https://www.opendesk.cc/open/unit/unit-table/get-it-made) **£330 - 400** from a [maker near you](https://www.opendesk.cc/open/unit/unit-table/get-it-made) _Of which a proportion supports the designer, and keeps the platform ticking! [(find out more about how it works »)](https://www.opendesk.cc/designs/how-it-works)._ _PLEASE NOTE: Pricing varies based on your location and local maker capacity._
---
#### [Need additional help planning? All products bought through Opendesk include a 12-month guarantee. Current UK pricing for this product & service, (again including support for the designer and platform): **£365** **[REQUEST CALL BACK](https://www.opendesk.cc/workspaces/lets-fit-you-out)** _This service is only available in the UK at the moment, if you are outside the UK you can connect to a local maker near you. The price is based on recent UK maker quotes. Excludes VAT, delivery and assembly._
